originalText.text: My husband and I finished renovating our apartment. We connected two apartments into one and completely renovated and designed the toilets and baths and we changed all the carpets in the house to a wooden floor. Ophir's team worked professionally and quickly. They helped us with all the administration and permits and were always available for questions. They are flexible to changes and pleasant to work with. The end result is perfect. I recommend this company both in terms of professionalism and in terms of prices.

text.text: My husband and I finished renovating our apartment. We connected two apartments into one and completely renovated and designed the toilets and baths and we changed all the carpets in the house to a wooden floor. Ophir's team worked professionally and quickly. They helped us with all the administration and permits and were always available for questions. They are flexible to changes and pleasant to work with. The end result is perfect. I recommend this company both in terms of professionalism and in terms of prices.

originalText.text: I recently bought a fixer upper in Harlem, after much research I settled on Overall Renovation to take care of all the many renovations. Overall installed a new custom media wall for me which was much needed for storage space. They connected the guest and master bedrooms to create a master suite with a new bathroom and walk-in closet. I had the tile floors removed and wood flooring in its place with new soundproofing. All windows, framing and moldings were replaced. Overall Renovation not only worked quickly, they stayed within budget and had no "surprise" fees throughout the project which was a refreshing change from other contractors I have used in the past. They arranged for permits within a couple of days, and sent in all the documents for the alteration agreement within a day of signing the contract. I highly recommend taking the leap and trusting Overall Renovation, I am now living in my new space and couldn't be happier!

originalText.text:
Overall renovation worked on two projects for me simultaneously. They redid my bathroom and opened an archway in my kitchen wall with skill, professionalism, attentiveness, and relative speed. Working with them was a positive experience from the start. They swiftly responded to my initial inquiry, met with me, and gave me a fair estimate. Communication with project manager Matt and CFO Natalie was easy and reliable from day one.

Once the work started, it progressed at a decent pace. The workers collaborated efficiently and were respectful and friendly. They and their supervisors checked in with me constantly to make sure I was happy with what they were doing. This focus was maintained until the jobs were completed. They continue to follow up with me, and I am grateful. I highly recommend Overall Renovation.

originalText.text: Matt and his team did wonderful work on my apartment. Changed my existing french doors into beautiful barn doors and added some storage cubbies and shelving to my living room. Great job!
